articles.title: What Boston meteorologists are saying about the timing and impacts of Wednesday’s snow
articles.description:
As New England continues to dig out from a blizzard, meteorologists say to expect some light snow mixed with rain before much melting takes place.

articles.description:

articles.title: View Boston to shutter observatory restaurants, cut 79 jobs
articles.description:
View Boston is ending restaurant service at its three-story observatory atop the Prudential Center, shifting toward hosting more private events.

articles.title: Boston couple’s wedding disrupted by blizzard — they got married anyway
articles.description:

articles.title: After calling police, Conn. man kills terminally ill wife and then himself
articles.description:
John Ezzell informed 911 dispatchers that his wife, Christine, was suffering from terminal cancer and he intended to take her life and then his own.

articles.title: Derrick White, Celtics blow out Suns in second half, win fourth straight: 7 takeaways
articles.description:
